_header: Jesu that is heaven king / To His disciples said this thing
_description: Gospel, ‘In vigilia apostolorum Petri et Pauli’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IHesus þat is heuene kyngTo his disciplus seide þis
                    þing…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He vs graunte þat ilke wayÞat for vs diȝede a
                    goode fryday. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Dixit Ihesus petro sequere me / Hoc est preceptum meum vt dilgatus
                    (f. 222vc-223ra)

                        ed.

                poet.a.1,

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
IHesus þat is heuene kyngTo his disciples seide þis
                    þing…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…He vs graunt þat ilke wayþat for vs dyed on goode
                    friday. Amen
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title:
Dixit Ihesus Petro sequere me / Hoc est preceptum meum vt diligatis
                    (f. 25rb)
